channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Hugo Cactus Theme

item.title: Setting Up the NodeMCU
item.description: The Project This is a robot that would allow me to track the moisture level of the soil in my baby tomato plant and pump water to it. I wanted the system to have a WiFi accessible API to be able to send data on the real time moisture level of the soil. I also wanted it to be able to accept JSON on the desired moisture level of the soil.

item.title: hello.
item.description: Hey everyone! This is my first post so hello, world! I’m creating this blog as a place to document projects and generally just stuff I’ve learned.
